ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] twisting troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a PII 266 with 96 megs.. and if I feel like paying enough attention I can twist 4 songs.  (Video card is nothing special ATI Rage 2 with not a lot of
ygData.messageBody:
I have a PII 266 with 96 megs.. and if I feel like
paying enough attention I can twist 4 songs. (Video
card is nothing special ATI Rage 2 with not a lot of
memory 16???)

It is really too much watching of messages in battle
to twist 4 songs..

And lately Ive been grouped with 2 other bards, so Ive
gotten really lazy and sometimes only play one and
very rarely 3 songs.

--- Elijah Meeker <elijah@...> wrote:
> >Problem is that I tend to lose the first song icon
> for
> >just a few seconds before cycling it again.
>
>
> I routinely twist 3-4 songs on my Pentium II 233,
> but I do have 128 meg of
> RAM (though only 16meg of video RAM). So I am
> guessing that RAM might be
> your problem. But is that really a K3? Like before
> the K5/K6? I didnt think
> they HAD a K3 400.
>
> Tszaaz
>
